div.p: Sketch of the linear combination in the Variational Method for a 20 NPS chain on a gold surface. Black lines symbolize modes of three different systems (from left to right): 20 NPs chain, 20 NPs chain on the surface, and the surface with the plasmon energy ω p = 8.87 eV. The green region illustrates the position of the bright mode ω < ω 0 with ω 0 = 2.38 eV.
